setup.steps: after updating pushover below, rename file to config (no extension)
setup.pushover_setup: visit https://pushover.net to setup account; there is a one-time $5 purchase required; update application_token and user_token information below
setup.timezone_setup: update timezone information below to matching TZ database name; https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones
